website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight float gets the job done, as long as the camera is light enough.
pros: Gives you free hands for water sports
Soft and comfortable on your wrist
Not as bulky as other wrist strap floats
cons: Too big for children's and small adults' wrists
Connector string can fray and break

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for the underwater camera and it works great. Last week I attached this to my selfie ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the underwater camera and it works great. Last week I attached this to my selfie stick that I use for my GoPro, which also has a floaty thingie on the back of the GoPro underwater case. I attached this to the opposite end of the GoPro, just in case. While in shallow water and taking off my snorkel gear, I let go of the pole. After removing my gear, I looked over to my GoPro/heavy metal selfie stick and it was floating! With this Foam Floating Camera Wrist Strap AND the orange floaty foam block attached to the underwater GoPro case, it stayed afloat all by itself, a wonderful surprise! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Corryn Marrero-Spyrou

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof camera wrist strap is a tittle more flimsy than it looks, however, it did the trick. I didn't let the camera go to see if it would float, but I could feel the pull of the buoyancy on my arm, so I'm sure it would float as light as the camera is. It was handy to be able to slide it up my arm above to get it out of the way while snorkeling to different locations. I got the pink, but rather than the picture showing matt black (where it attaches to the pink) it was a shiny patent leather look which looks rather goofy. Overall it did what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Snowcreek

customer_reviews.title: Not working for Olympus Stylus Tough 8010
customer_reviews.text: I connected this camera strap to my Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 and let it go in the pool to confirm it would float. The experiment failed. Unfortunately, it seems the Olympus camera is too heavy for the strap. I does however increase the buoyancy so I would have a chance to catching it before it gets too deep, but I will definitely need to purchase another strap to ensure my camera actually floats.
customer_reviews.author: SindyH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time & was easy to open. I got a chance to use it this past week snorkeling in the Gulf of Mexico. This Cowboy Yellow Foam Floater clips onto your waterproof camera easily (& clips off when you're on land), the wrist strap can be adjusted for tightness & fit, certainly the price is right...and most importantly, I tossed my camera into the water a few feet away, & the highly visible yellow float bobs along the surface with the camera just inches below. Perfect! If you have a smaller waterproof camera that is not too big & heavy...I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JSM69

customer_reviews.title: Only wish is that it was a bit smaller to better fit kids wrists
customer_reviews.text: We gave our daughter a camera for her birthday. We added this so it would float In the pool if she let go of it. She has had it for about 6 weeks. Though it's a little big for her wrist it does it's job well. Only wish is that it was a bit smaller to better fit kids wrists, it is even big for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilmot

customer_reviews.title: cord to camera frays easily
customer_reviews.text: Does not tighten enough to be snug on a child's arm, and the cord linking the wristband to the camera frayed very quickly as my child absentmindedly twisted it. Generally a good idea though, just needs more durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tobias

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I threw the waterproof camera (Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS25) into a pool with the strap and it worked like a charm. I'm a happy customer, I hope it last for a while though, the materials are not the strongest, but for the price though is fair enough.
customer_reviews.author: Christel

customer_reviews.title: Works for Canon Powershot D20
customer_reviews.text: I tested it first at home, using the bath tub to make sure that it would indeed float before taking it on vacation. Used it with my Canon Powershot D20 on vacation that involved lots of swimming, snorkeling and island hopping. Camera with this strap was thrown around in pool and beach and camera stayed afloat at all times. When swimming I deep waters, I did strap it around wrist tightly though - just for added precaution.
customer_reviews.author: sa2807

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine and fits good!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about this and some ppl said it was too big for small wrists but I took my chance and ordered it. It is totally fine and I have pretty small wrists. 5 & 1/2 inches to be exact. I am not saying I couldn't slip it over my hand but I didn't find myself worrying that it might fall off. It was tight enough. I love the shade of blue. And it held up my camera just fine. I have the Fujifilm FinePix XP60.
customer_reviews.author: beesbrat

customer_reviews.title: Keeps small point & shoot afloat
customer_reviews.text: This falls off my wrist because it's not adjustable to wrist size. However, it kept my small point and shoot afloat (about 8oz). Great for standing pools of water but if you have a small wrist, it can easily slip off and float away from you down river or out to sea.
customer_reviews.author: cali321Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my Panasonic Lumix and it worked fantastic. No worries about it slipping off my arm, and even when I took it off, it floated perfectly. My only reason for 4 stars is that it's big, which makes it slightly uncomfortable on the wrist - however, without that thickness you probably wouldn't get the buoyancy...so it seems a fair trade off. Overall I'd recommend to anyone with a lighter style waterproof camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jenah

customer_reviews.title: Best Item Ever for saving anything camera cell phone anything
customer_reviews.text: i bought a fujifilm xp60 waterproof camera and i was skeptical of buying this item cause the camera its self is kinda heavy to my concern this strap worked perfectly. i went to the Bahamas with this camera and let it float in the ocean and it kept my camera afloat i recommend this product to anyone for one reason YOU WANT TO NOT LOOSE YOUR STUFF. This is a perfect item to save your stuff
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this on many trips with my waterproof camera. The strap is really comfortable and I love how bright it is-- it's easy to find and grab if you're passing the camera between people. It's never slipped off my wrist, but I imagine it would be easy to located the bright pink in the water if it did happen to fall off. The pink floater easily removes from the part of the strap that connects to the camera-- the attachment is very secure, so I'm not scared of losing it, but also allows me to quickly remove the pink floater!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good Wristrap
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought an underwater camera for some upcoming adventures and got this strap to help it float in case we dropped it. Took it to Discovery Cove in Orlando yesterday and it worked wonderfully. The only drawback it the size. The strap is adjustable up to the blue part. It fits tight on my husband, but I have smaller wrists. At its tightest point, the strap is still loose and could get away from me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: A little clunky, but worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my rafting trip and it worked great! I loved the break away clip for time when I wanted to hand my camera off to someone to take a photo of me. I never actually tested the floatability of the wrist strip, but it held up to a lot of movement and was comfy on my wrist, if a bit clunky, but it wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Saved my camera 8 times in one day
customer_reviews.text: I went on a kayaking trip and capsized several times plus a few times when I jumped in to swim the camera came out of my pocket and I didn't realize it. Every time I saw this bright yellow strap floating away and easily got it back. One time the camera got caught on a branch a couple feet under some fairly murky water and I found it because I could see the yellow underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Our camera floated! We purchased and used this during ...
customer_reviews.text: Our camera floated! We purchased and used this during our latest trip to Hawaii. While out on a kayak, the camera slipped off into the water and our camera was NOT lost. Thank you for helping us save our memories.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Peak

customer_reviews.title: Affordable - and the yellow color is great for visibility!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Caribbean cruise to use with a Nikon waterproof camera. Decided on this one because reviews and price were fantastic. I also like the fact that it is bright yellow, so it's easy to find in the water if it comes off your wrist. Our camera floated great with it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: esd087

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my underwater Panasonic. The wrist strap is comfortable and it really floats well. (Yes, I tried it in shallow pool water!) the strap is adjustible and fit well on both my wrist and my husband's. We also put the car keys on the strap, so it is easy to keep with us at the warter park.
customer_reviews.author: Rita D.

customer_reviews.title: doesnt even work
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, flimsy, can't even float the small nikon waterproof camera that I bought it for. This was supposed to go along with a gift that I had purchased for a friend, the strap is so embarrassingly cheap looking that I never gave it to them.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: good investment to keep from loosing your waterproof camera while ...
customer_reviews.text: does what is says, if camera escape ones hand it holds camera on top of water, would buy another one if ever need one, good investment to keep from loosing your waterproof camera while in the water. would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to connect to the camera and wrist by yourself
customer_reviews.text: Kept this on my wrist with a borrowed underwater camera. I was able to lock in the strap securely so the camera did not fall off. Very easy to connect to the camera and wrist by yourself. You can tighten or loosen very easily while in use underwater. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: robin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really functional and attractive floating wrist strap
customer_reviews.text: love this! color matched my Sony camera :), snug-up clip kept the band secure on my wrist w/o sliding around, didn't have to hold the camera all the time, and I can detach the wristband part and still keep the strap part on the camera. I used it for a week at the beach in NC. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work - lost  my camera in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wrist strap to help protect my camera from sinking. Although the float did keep it from sinking for a bit, the string broke with the float still attached to my wrist and I watched my camera sink to the ocean floor in 100 feet of water while snorkeling. I would never recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C D

customer_reviews.title: Good fabric, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like how adjustable the strap is, and how well-made the fabric is. I dragged this all through the water, sweat on it, got sunblock and bug spray on it and it all washed away without wearing off the fabric. Granted, I've only used it for just about 2 months, but it has been heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: Cordobes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Many of these are too rubbery and ugly, and the blue ones are useless to me because I have trouble finding the camera in the ocean. I love this pink one. It makes my point-and-shoot camera float and I can easily see it and find it if it falls off my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lifesaver for camera
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my water camera (Fujifilm FinePix waterproof). I have never taken this off my camera. It is bright enough (the color is just as pictured) to see in murky water and keeps my camera afloat.
customer_reviews.author: J. La Tour

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny wrist
customer_reviews.text: I have a very slim 5-1/2 inch wrist and did not have to worry about this slipping off. That was my number one concern and thanks to other reviews was the reason I chose this item. Weighs almost nothing and very easy to put on your camera or case. The slide closure is easy to use one handed and stays put wet or dry.
customer_reviews.author: AllyOops

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have super tiny wrists (less than 6" ...
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have super tiny wrists (less than 6" around). Don't forget to actually put it on your camera though. RIP camera. Another ocean sacrifice...
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Item received is not the quality shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.text: Product received is not the same as the photo description. Note the 4 foam squares in the pic. The one I received only has 3... Which means cheaper product and less buoyancy. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: sdj1904

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great color and OK quality. I like the black patent piece on it. Stitching came out half way but doesn't affect function - it didn't break apart or anything. Floats the small waterproof camera that I got and matches the color perfectly. Its a bright neon pink. Also cool feature is that you can detach the float quickly with the snap if you want to keep the loop attached but not the float.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids to attach to their underwater cameras but these do not adjust any tighter to fit a kid. It great for adults. Wish it adjusted more.
customer_reviews.author: itsmesonya

customer_reviews.title: We went snorkeling in Mexico and purchased an under water ...
customer_reviews.text: We went snorkeling in Mexico and purchased an under water camera. This worked perfectly and it comes off and on with ease allowing me and my hubs to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Michelove

customer_reviews.title: Used in St. Martin
customer_reviews.text: Used it like crazy on our vacation to St. Martin/St. Maarten. It floats as expected and the strap doesn't bother your wrist while wearing it. We dived and snorkeled with it and I had absolutely no worries or problems while using it.
customer_reviews.author: b.blanksnen

customer_reviews.title: great items,,mostly for pools and beachesq
customer_reviews.text: i USED THIS ITEMS ALOT,,went to the beach plenty and used this items all the time,,loil most useful items lol Check us out here website. partyhousesupplies facebook. party house supplies gmail. trinipartyhouse at gmail
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Roach

customer_reviews.title: great color, not the best floating
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy, won't stay above water for a camera, but a light phone yes. It's color does make it nice to keep and eye on your phone when you are out on the water though
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: but it came to the surface (thank goodness) Easy to spot in the
customer_reviews.text: Works, I lost my camera in Tahiti, but it came to the surface (thank goodness) Easy to spot in the water
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I needed a float strap for snorkeling and this did the job well. Kept my camera afloat when needed. Adjusted to fit my wrist nicely while I was swimming, keeping my camera handy when I wanted to snap pictures. I'll be buying another today.
customer_reviews.author: LeilaG

customer_reviews.title: Very good straps.
customer_reviews.text: These cinch down for a snug fit and are buoyant enough to float our olympius tg1 up to the surface. Very happy with these straps.
customer_reviews.author: OhhWell

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Broke within minutes of the first use. Almost lost my camera in the ocean!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Using it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Holding up much better than expected. I use this 2 to 3 times a week, and it has been about 9 months now. The only part that is not fully functioning is the spring in the little black button on the sliding thingy. It has rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Made well and works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the kodak underwater cameras i got for my children, they have saved the day several times at the pool - even if they forget to attach it to thier wrist it keeps the camera afloat if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional, as described
customer_reviews.text: The floating camera strap works just fine. It floats and also keeps our waterproof camera afloat as well too. Fits snug on the wrist, a little bit bulky but that's out of necessity to actually float. I'm giving it 5 stars not because I love the product but it works 100% as expected and don't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if this works or not
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use tis. I bought it to go with the SVP Aqua 5800 Pink 18MP Dual Screen Waterproof Digital Camera , nice color match but the camera never worked. :(
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cat NC

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, it floats, my only problem was that it got in the way as I was trying to learn to snorkel. Obviously not it's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So conveniet. I use this on my waterproof camera when kayaking and tubing. Works great! Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Frassrand

customer_reviews.title: COOL
customer_reviews.text: This was a neat gadget! Did it's job and it's cute too! Not nearly as bulky as it appears to be in the photo either! It's worth the buy ESPECIALLY if you're planning on going into the ocean to take pics! I would buy this item again!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright color
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright color. Will be able to find it if I lose the attached product in the water. Have not tested its floatation ability yet. Update to come
customer_reviews.author: A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly inexpensive and served the purpose I wanted it for. Kept me from loosing my water camera at the bottom of the ocean while snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: D-Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Camera float
customer_reviews.text: We read all the reviews and then selected this float. We snorkeled all last week and it worked wonderfully. It was better fitting than another one I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Boddy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Bright yellow color.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the purpose. A bit large, but if it keeps you from losing your camera in the water, who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my water proof camera. it floats well, and adjusts very well to fit onto wrists. The fact that it can detach very easily is extremely convenient as well! I have had absolutely no problems with it after about 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Major NEED for underwater camera
customer_reviews.text: Having this makes your snorkeling more relaxing. If u don't feel like taking pix ten it hangs off your wrist float. Pretty cool. So glad I bought that together.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Is easy to see and helps keep our camera
customer_reviews.text: worked as expected. Even fit my smaller sized wrists. Is easy to see and helps keep our camera safe
customer_reviews.author: CountryMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Save the life of my waterproof camera million times. I never go to the river without it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is designed to do
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine. We were able to pass the camera back and forth underwater with no worries
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go with my new underwater camera and it did the trick. It was so light weight, I wasn't sure it would hold the camera afloat but it offered plenty of buoyancy and was perfect. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Cianbi

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Simple design that works. I have a 6-inch wrist and it JUST cinches small enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my vacation to Mexico. It worked great. It kept my camera afloat but I was a little skeptical about the little tie that loops around the camera, it seems so thin it could break. That's what happened to one I bought last year. But this one hasn't broken yet, so still good.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: Happy as just the right size for my wife's hand. Only very difficult to disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Bird

customer_reviews.title: works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: it floats! attached to our waterproof camera for pool and snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnr

customer_reviews.title: Practical Wrist Strap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on a waterproof camera in case it was dropped while using it. Like the vivid color and the way it does float.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: ... wearing but my camera didn't swim away so that's good!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to get use to wearing but my camera didn't swim away so that's good!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Floats!
customer_reviews.text: Was great for my trip to St. Thomas! Worked great for the snorkeling trip we went on!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra L. Barra

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, floated well the water and like the fact that if I don't have it in the pool, I can just remove from the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Done Deal
customer_reviews.text: Came early, was exactly as described. Worked as it should. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Not the most stylish thing on the beach but works exactly as adveritsed :)
customer_reviews.text: I have a waterproof panasonic lumix and this thing did a wonderful job of keeping it afloat in both salt water and pool water. The color makes it stand out too. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what is says it does. I love the color! It's nice to not be worried about your camera sinking :)
customer_reviews.author: Fonrin

customer_reviews.title: Floats Good, but the string broke
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every day in the lake for 4 days straight and then used it in the river for a couple of days. It might have worn out the thin string that is attached to the camera. When I was at the lake this past week, the string broke and my camera started to sink. Luckily I was able to catch my camera. I would not recommend this for the ocean or anywhere that you cannot see the bottom, unless you use a second wrist strap to make sure you do not lose your camera. I will most likely from now on always use a second strap on my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Vibeke L Clark

customer_reviews.title: floating strap
customer_reviews.text: floating wrist strap worked perfectly for my daughter's camera on our spring break trip. visible and well functioning. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Renee J. Wicklund

customer_reviews.title: Great for underwater cameras
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these on any camera I take to the beach. They really work well, are not too bulky and can save you from losing your camera overboard.
customer_reviews.author: L.Rock

customer_reviews.title: ... camera above water if it falls off but it's comfortable on your wrist
customer_reviews.text: Probably won't keep your camera above water if it falls off but it's comfortable on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: A Random User

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my underwater camera. Keeps it safe while I can taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: F. McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you have a waterproof camera you need this! Don't want it to fall off the boat!

customer_reviews.title: works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: works just like advertised, cords and body rugged and sturdy enough for the compact camera I use with it

customer_reviews.title: Water proof camera - not floating on its own
customer_reviews.text: Water proof camera - not floating on its own You need this in case it slips from your arms And it is bright so you can find it easily

customer_reviews.title: Good Flotation Strap
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an add-on item for a camera purchased for a birthday. Easy on, easy off. Works as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will hold up well on our next snorkeling trip - will post back if it doesn't!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome... Tested it on my camera in the river and had no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Good floatation device
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for using in water and not wanting to loose camera. Going snorkeling in deep water and want safety strap.

customer_reviews.title: Good Strap
customer_reviews.text: Got for my son. He uses and abuses and this thing but it is holding up well so I think that deserves 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: used with AW100 and AW110
customer_reviews.text: Floats with AW100 and AW110. the color helps make it easier to spot. have used it in pools, rivers, lakes and ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Camera floated when we tested it. Very comfortable and the secure fit offered lots ofmpeace of mind while we were snorkleing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. I didn't have to worry about losing my camera in the water.
customer_reviews.author: ChcgoDEB

customer_reviews.title: Holds the camera up so no change of it falling ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds the camera up so no change of it falling to the bottom of the ocean when snorkeling. Wise choice on my part to add this on when I purchased the Lumix camera.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my GoPro afloat perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used this to attach to my GoPro headstrap mount in the event that it came off during any water activities and it works likes a champ. GoPro never sinks and makes it easy to recover if it falls off.

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I tested this out in the Bahamas and it floats very well, and is decently visible.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: This strap worked great. Attached it to our Polaroid waterproof case so we wouldn't have to worry about losing our camera.

customer_reviews.title: went snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I went to the Bahamas snorkeling with this and it was great. I never worried about losing it and it dried very quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great strap that worked well
customer_reviews.text: Great strap that worked well to help with taking pictures in the water. I would recomend this for your waterproof camera

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I use this strap with my waterproof camera all the time. I love knowing, if it comes off of my wrist (which it never has), it won't let my camera sink to the bottom of the ocean.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: If you are planning to take any type of underwater pictures get this to insure that your camera stays a float.

customer_reviews.text: nothing bad about this, kept my camera afloat. It did its job and thats all i could ask for. :)

customer_reviews.title: and bright pretty color I can see
customer_reviews.text: Works well... camera floats, and bright pretty color I can see :)

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. I read the reviews and it was a solid product. I would buy again with no hesitation.

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on my wrist and served its purpose. Plus it matched my camera. I really like that it adjusts to fit many wrist sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Need more information
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested this in water yet, but wanted to leave information on my initial take. It is of much lower quality than what I was thinking it might be (granted, I bought the cheapest, so I'm not surprised). It shipped from China, which I wasn't expecting. All things considered it got here fairly quickly (about 3 weeks), but I was pretty worried when I saw it would be shipping internationally less than a month from the trip I was buying it for. Don't expect this to make it to you much quicker than 3 weeks. I didn't see anything, anywhere in the description that indicated it would be sent internationally.
customer_reviews.author: etapi65

customer_reviews.title: Great floating wrist strap at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great floatation wrist strap for my Cannon Power Shot camera. Just returned from a trip to St. Thomas and St. John where we used the yellow floating strap during snorkeling. Fit secure on the wrist and bright color made if easy to see in the water.
customer_reviews.author: CROD

customer_reviews.title: This this is pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: This this is pretty cool!. It's nice knowing that my camera won't just sink to the bottom of the ocean.

product_meta.title: CowboyStudio Blue Foam Floating Camera Wrist Strap for UnderWater/WaterProof Cameras - Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueA floating, quick release style strap for all your aquatic photography needs. The bright color material makes it easy to find in the water to avoid being lost. The bright colored strap is easy to see in pools, lakes, oceans, or other bodies of water. It provides surfers, kayakers, and other active swimmers with the ability to strap the camera to their arm, freeing their hands when not taking photos.

This wrist camera strap is designed to work with smaller, light weight digital cameras. Please keep in mind that heavy DSLR cameras will not float with this strap.
feature_bullets: Keeps cameras afloat and easy to find in the water
Provides surfers, kayakers and other active swimmers with the ability to strap the camera to their arm,
Freeing their hands when not taking photos
